message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,000. I believe this is a great deal, considering the value it will bring to your business.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $9,000 is a bit high for me. Would you consider $7,000?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $9,000 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to offer the product to you for $8,500. I think this is a fair price, considering the value it will bring to your business.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  While $8,500 is closer, I'm aiming for something closer to $7,500. Would that work for you?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking for a price closer to $7,500, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $8,500 and $7,500, so I'm now offering the product to you for $8,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value the product brings to your business.
